alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:39PM EST until February 27 at 5:17PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding threatens low lying roads and structures. At 25.0 feet, Low lying areas along George Hayes Road flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday evening and continue to a crest of 24.8 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM Thursday.
